item.description:
Hi all,

It looks like good weather on Saturday, April 19.

I'll set up a net at Boston Common on Saturday at 1 PM in the usual location, across from the CVS on Tremont Street.

For people who haven't played there before, from the tennis courts, walk along Tremont Street away from Boylston Street until you see the CVS on Tremont (we'll be on the grass across the street from the CVS). It should be no more than a two minute walk.
item.name: Boston Common Volleyball, Sat 4/19 at 1 PM
